statements: SELECT * FROM physics_laboratory_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM physics_laboratory_equipment
SELECT equipment_name, manufacturer, quantity FROM physics_laboratory_equipment ORDER BY manufacturer ASC
SELECT * FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE price > 100
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'LabCorp'
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, manufacturer, quantity, price FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'Company A' ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT equipment_name, price FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE quantity > 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC
SELECT * FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE price BETWEEN 100 AND 500 ORDER BY equipment_id ASC
SELECT equipment_id, manufacturer, price FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Corp%' AND price < 300 ORDER BY manufacturer, equipment_id
SELECT equipment_id, equipment_name, quantity FROM physics_laboratory_equipment WHERE quantity = (SELECT MAX(quantity) FROM physics_laboratory_equipment)
SELECT * FROM equipment
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0
SELECT manufacturer, name FROM equipment ORDER BY manufacturer DESC
SELECT location, status FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND status = 'Available'
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'A%'
SELECT id, name, manufacturer, quantity FROM equipment WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM equipment JOIN inventory ON equipment.id = inventory.equipment_id WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM equipment GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_count > 2;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 10 AND manufacturer LIKE 'XYZ%' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT equipment.id, location, status FROM inventory INNER JOIN equipment ON inventory.equipment_id = equipment.id WHERE status = 'AVAILABLE' ORDER BY location, equipment.id ASC;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_id, name, location FROM equipment;
SELECT name, description FROM equipment WHERE location='Lab';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE status='available';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM lab_supervisor;
SELECT * FROM equipment WHERE name = 'Microscope';
SELECT equipment_id, name, description FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10 AND status = 'Available';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Lab B';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM lab_supervisor WHERE supervisor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT name, type FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM suppliers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT id, name, type FROM equipment ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT t.id, t.equipment_id, t.transaction_type, e.name AS equipment_name FROM transactions t JOIN equipment e ON t.equipment_id = e.id ORDER BY t.date ASC;

SELECT s.name AS supplier_name, s.contact_person, s.phone_number, e.name AS equipment_name, t.quantity FROM suppliers s JOIN transactions t ON s.id = e.supplier_id JOIN equipment e ON t.equipment_id = e.id;
SELECT * FROM equipment;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_type DESC;
SELECT inventory_id, location FROM inventory WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT scientist_id, first_name, last_name, specialization FROM scientists;

SELECT equipment_name, equipment_type FROM equipment WHERE quantity < 5 ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT scientist_id, first_name, last_name, specialization FROM scientists WHERE specialization = 'Physics';
SELECT * FROM inventory JOIN equipment ON inventory.equipment_id = equipment.equipment_id WHERE location = 'Lab A';
SELECT experiment_id, scientist_id, equipment_id, experiment_date FROM experiments WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
